meanings.sent1: The bird's keratinous beak helped it crack open seeds.
meanings.sent2: Her keratinous hair shone in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The keratinous nails on the cat made it look like a tiny lion.
meanings.sent4: The turtle's keratinous shell protected it from predators.
meanings.sent5: The keratinous scales of the fish glistened as it swam.

meanings.sent1: The keratinous skin cells formed a protective barrier.
meanings.sent2: The horse's keratinous hooves clicked on the pavement.
meanings.sent3: The keratinous feathers of the bird made it look fluffy.
meanings.sent4: Her keratinous hair grew long and healthy.
meanings.sent5: The keratinous horns of the rhinoceros were impressive.

meanings.definition: Covered with a layer of keratin.
meanings.sent1: The keratinous scales of the reptile were tough and durable.
meanings.sent2: His keratinous calluses protected his hands during hard work.
meanings.sent3: The keratinous claws of the bear were perfect for climbing trees.
meanings.sent4: The keratinous beak of the parrot was colorful and strong.
meanings.sent5: The keratinous shell of the tortoise was a natural armor.
